mods.note: HU Telegram. Gr.T.C. From - Britconsul, Bushire. To - Political, Bahrain.. No. - 1130 Dated - 25th November 1934. Flag should be flown on all Government and public buildings on Thursday 29th November 1934 for wedding of His Royal Highness Duke of Kent. Britc onsul.■■■■■■■■■■■ITelegram. 3.T.C. Fr<i>m - Britconsul, Bush ire. To - Political, Bahrain. No. - 1130. Dated - 25th November 1934. Flag should he flown on all Government and public buildings on Thursday 29th November 1934 for wedding of His Royal Highness the Luke of Kent. r lhe foregoing copy is forwarded, with compliments, to the Adviser to the Bahrain Government, Bahrain, for information. Britconsul No. , Political Agendy, Bahrain, the 26th November 1934 I.C. S. , Assistant Political Agent, +BahrainA S.No. S.No.2, telegram No. 1130 dated the 25th November 1934 from Britconsul, Bushire. A. P. A. Reference the attached telegram. It is not clear whether the flagstaff should be dressed orxaxijfc* or only a big flag flown on Sundays should be used* K ,r ^ I think we should also inform H. E. the Shaikh about it. ‘ ■ yii 4* lutt y IrSluL*. fc' 6 Tilt, A *P •A# When the Duke of York was married, no intimation was sent to this Office as I cannot trace any papers. I have seen also both Kuwait and Bahrain diaries of April 1923 and no mention was made in them that the flagstaff was dressed or flag was flown on that day pleaseShould we enquire from Bushire please. A© k bjLsr~> ^ (’ No.1679 dated 26-11-34 to the Adviser.*

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File No 20/8 Ceremonials:- Corr. re:- Marriage of Duke of Kent 29th November 1934.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Folios 4 and 5 are file notes.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains telegrams regarding the wedding of the Duke of Kent on 29 November 1934.The correspondence is between the British Consul, Bushire, and the Political Agency, Bahrain.
